Where Carbon Players Come 
To Do Business




Come together with investment banks, private equity funds, hedge funds, carbon funds, project developers and lenders, clean tech companies, energy companies, major corporations, and other active carbon players to establish relationships and take advantage of the growing opportunities in:

The global carbon market
The retail carbon market
The greenhouse gas reduction project and aggregator market
Clean technologies
Trading and investing in carbon offsets and allowances

About the Summit:

The integration of North America into the global carbon business arena is ushering in a wealth of new business opportunities for North American and European firms alike.  U.S. firms are quickly making their move to expand their activities in both North America and around the globe, while Europeans are setting up shop to do business in the U.S.  The environment for building new business relationships, taking advantage of new opportunities, and making deals is undeniably ripe! 

Leveraging off our highly successful Finance & Investment Summit series, Infocast is launching the new place to be for carbon players with its inaugural Carbon Finance & Investment Summit. This is sure to be the place for players in the carbon market-where carbon players will come year after year to do business and make deals. 
The Summit will bring together leading investment banks, carbon funds, carbon companies, private equity funds, hedge funds, project developers, carbon aggregators, project lenders, energy companies, major corporations, clean tech companies and other players to facilitate the building of business relationships and to foster new market transactions.

The Summit will also offer the perfect venue to gain a deep understanding of how these players intend to play in the world markets, the retail markets, and the project market as well as their plans for technology plays and other investment strategies.  They will discuss

The type of opportunities they are pursuing
The strategies they are adopting
The type of relationships they are seeking to establish with third parties
The drivers that will determine which type of deals they are willing to make
The factors that will influence the level of their transactions in the coming year

The Summit is a highly productive environment where you can successfully network and conduct business with carbon players who are leading the way forward in developing the carbon markets of the future.



Pre-Summit Workshop:

The pre-Summit workshop Estimating Carbon Values and Assessing their Impact on Alternative Business Model will explore the approaches to developing a clear estimate of future carbon value and will look at how these carbon values impact the viability of four specific business models
